A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I watched this movie on Friday with a couple of my friends. I really enjoyed it. Sure\, it wasn't perfect and there were moments where I questioned what they were doing. But I felt so excited about the next Star Wars film coming out of the cinemas. \nSo I was quite confused when I began looking into spoiler reviews for this movie where there was a significant portion of the population that hated this film. I wasn't alive to see the original star wars films and I admit I am not a big fan of the franchise. However that maybe the reason why some of the things that bothered hard core fans didn't bother me. I think people should still watch it because you will be surprised at what this film has to offer.
